questions.question: This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates entering a secretive country ruled by a powerful Shogun and an Emperor. What is...?
Taking place on a unique island, this arc introduces the character of Chopper, a reindeer with the ability to transform. What is...?
This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This ability, seen in the Wano arc, allows the user to transform into an ancient dragon. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Kaido's Dragon

questions.question: This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This lesser-known member of the Revolutionary Army is recognized for his ability to create powerful winds and for being the second-in-command to Monkey D. Dragon. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
